column1: Correcting for H, dominant trees have lowest Rt.
There is a negative interactive effect between H and topographic wetness index.
2a. Wood density correlates negatively to Rt.
2b. Leaf mass per area correlates positively to Rt.
2c. Ring-porous species have higher Rt than diffuse- or semi-ring- porous.
2d. Percent loss leaf area upon desiccation correlates negatively with Rt.
2e. Water potential at turgor loss correlates negatively with Rt.
